inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version of Yarn to install
inputs.helpMarkDown: A version or version range that specifies the Yarn version to make available on the path. Use x as a wildcard. See the [list of available Yarn versions](https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/releases).

inputs.name: checkLatest
inputs.label: Always download the latest matching version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Always check for and download the latest available version of Yarn which satisfies the version spec. This option will also always incur download time, even if the selected version of Yarn is already cached.

Enabling this option could cause unexpected build breaks when a new version of Yarn is released.

inputs.name: includePrerelease
inputs.label: Include prereleases
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set releases marked as prereleases will be included. We recommand you don't set this unless you need it and you have a more restrictive version pattern such as ex: 1.7.x. Also, this parameter does not affect explicit version patterns ex: 1.7.1.
